body_html:
I think BatchNorm has a double backward function in Aten that should be called... but I'll check if it is

Edit: Sorry, the Aten Batchnorm double backwards is indeed calling the python one. Once I understand it I can try porting it over

body:
I think BatchNorm has a [double backward function in Aten](https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/csrc/autograd/functions/batch_normalization.cpp#L170) that should be called... but I'll check if it is

Edit: Sorry, the Aten Batchnorm double backwards is indeed calling the python one. Once I understand it I can try porting it over
